alert.note: Alert for Clarendon; Orangeburg (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 16 at 2:59PM EDT until August 16 at 3:30PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: The National Weather Service in Columbia has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Clarendon County in central South Carolina... East central Orangeburg County in central South Carolina... * Until 330 PM EDT. * At 259 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Santee State Park, or 16 miles southwest of Manning, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. * Locations impacted include... Summerton, Santee State Park, Santee Cooper Regional Airport, Santee, Eutawville, Vance, Eautaw Springs, Indian Bluff Recreation Park, St. Paul, Davis Station, Mill Creek Marina and Campground, and Poplar Creek Landing. This includes Interstate 95 between mile markers 96 and 113. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Severe thunderstorms can produce large capsizing waves and frequent lightning. If on or near Lake Marion move away from the water and take shelter!
